Detailed Description

XML configuration file parser for menu elements.

GPL v2

Authors: Martijn Brekhof <m.brekhof@gmail.com>

Typedef Documentation

nm_elements

Struct nm_element contains a pointer to the next nm_element. Creating a linked list. This typedef is merely to use the nm_elements in functions to make clear you are using a list of structs instead of just one.
